translations: n.牦牛；喋喋不休，连篇废话
vi.<非正式>喋喋不休地讲，瞎扯

sentences.sentence: Yak conveyance from Lhas to Yaan was only once a year.
sentences.translation: 从拉萨到雅安的牦牛运输，一年只能往返一次。

sentences.sentence: Note: Avoid wearing the Yak Trax indoors or on roads without snow.
sentences.translation: 注意：在室内或无雪的道路上应避免穿着Yak Trax。

sentences.sentence: Barley flour, yak butter and butter tea. Photo by Daniel McCrohan.
sentences.translation: 糌粑粉（糌粑）与酥油茶（博茶）
